segments.text: What's the cheapest way to go there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , is that right ? Is there a subway station near here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , there is one on the other side of the building .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good.Can I walk through this building ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid you can't . You'll have to go out there and walk around .
segments.speaker: S2
